page.title: 06BIRTHDAY PARTY,COTEHILL
page.content: On Friday night when school had finished I went home for my sister Carole's party.She had 7 friends for her party.When she got home she opened her presents then we went for the party tea.Everyone had plenty eat.I said to Laura,"Someone will come along with a needle and pop you."I said that to Laura because she ate so much.After tea we played games. The first game we played was pass the parcel.The parcel had a sweet in nearly every wrapping you took off.When Lisa got a sweet she gave it to someone else.When the pass the parcel had finished we had a game of musical statues then musical bumps. We went out to play on the swings then it was time to go home.
